channel.title: ~Easy for decent coders, Char on Account create~
channel.description:
Edit* What i mean whit char, is that you can edit account look & preferences on first log in :)
I need help whit this, I have it on my clean source but I cant seem to find a way to transfer it to my other server. Thanx for anny help :) ~ Linus

item.title: ~Easy for decent coders, Char on Account create~

item.description:

i got evrything else you’ll need to succesfully use it.

{

item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("char")) { showInterface(3559); }
That’s the command, I’ll get you the other command for first log in

Look for

first packet

Scroll down a little bit then add

showInterface(3559);
